Articles.Content:
After the massive success of the [Star angel](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110526-Space-Fighters) light cruiser our engineers have been hard at work cop..... er improving upon the already amazing ship. Weight reductions and new propulsion systems have created a much lighter and smaller craft coming in at only 52 tons and 72 parts, ,unfortunately this also meant removing the weapon bays to save weight. On the bright side the ship's new shape cast a very menacing shadow on the ground below. The engineers also advise against doing flips while the vertical thruster is active:confused:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/WNxBh)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dtl8xo57rzbzdjz/Phantam.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T14:08:09Z" title="02/27/2015 02:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Sabrez**
Very nice, but that engine looks like a giant [redacted] sticking out of it's rear. Apart from that, nice!

cool looking craft but you could just use the BBCode instead of the website e.g.
